summary: A comprehensive test suite that verifies the functionality of the API log handler, covering log emission rules, size constraints, behavior outside of run contexts with different settings, opt‑out handling, handler enable/disable states, explicit run identifiers, timestamp assignment, synchronous flushing from various contexts, and proper error reporting.
business_intent: Validate that the logging infrastructure correctly captures and forwards logs for workflow executions, adheres to configuration policies, and handles edge cases without disrupting the system, thereby ensuring reliable observability and debugging capabilities.
